greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: G.f.: (1+x)/(1+x-2*x^2).
comment: A signed version of A078008, which is the main entry.

[1, 0, 2, -2, 6, -10, 22, -42, 86,...] = an operator for toothpick sequences. The sequence convolved with A151548 = toothpick sequence A139250. The sequence convolved with A151555 = toothpick sequence A153006. - _Gary W. Adamson_, May 25 2009
formula: G.f.: 1 + x - x*Q(0), where Q(k) = 1 + 2*x^2 - (2*k+3)*x + x*(2*k+1 - 2*x)/Q(k+1); (continued fraction). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Oct 05 2013
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 25 2009, based on a suggestion from _Gary W. Adamson_
